notes: Quality that can be applied to any type of turret, concealing it in a pod or recess on the hull
Makes the turret detectable only when it is deployed
Weapons cannot move and are limited to firing in one direction
Fixing a turret costs half as much as a turret of that type, ie. a single turret mounted costs .1 MCr.

Pulse Laser.name: Pulse Laser
notes: Fires short bursts of energy at targets

Beam Laser.name: Beam Laser
notes: Fires continuous beams of energy at targets

Particle Beam.name: Particle Beam
notes: Fires a stream of accelerated subatomic particles
Inflicts an automatic radiation crew hit in addition to any other damage

Missile Rack.name: Missile Rack
notes: Damage depends on the type of missile used
Require ammunition - 12 missiles take up one ton of space

Sandcaster.name: Sandcaster
notes: Defensive weapon that dispense small particles which counteract the strength of lasers
Reduces the damage from a beam weapon by 1d6
Requires ammunition - 12 barrels take up one ton of space, cost .01 MCr.
